item.title: 人工智能检测器误导学生作弊—后果严重
item.description:
约三分之二的教师表示经常使用工具来检测人工智能生成的内容。在这种规模下，即使是微小的错误率也会迅速增加。【原文：

About two-thirds of teachers report regularly using tools for detecting AI-generated content. At that scale, even tiny error rates can add up quickly.

】

item.title: 宝马因火灾安全风险在中国召回近 70 万辆汽车
item.description: 由于冷却液泵存在缺陷，宝马汽车公司将在中国召回近 70 万辆汽车。【原文：BMW AG is recalling nearly 700,000 vehicles in China due to coolant pump defects, a fresh setback for the German carmaker that’s reeling from other vehicle faults.】

item.title: 印度在私营企业的帮助下奔向太空
item.description:
在彭博社原创系列Momentum的首播节目中，Haslinda Amin揭示了太空革命背后的私营公司网络。【原文：

On the premiere episode of the Bloomberg Originals series Momentum, Haslinda Amin reveals the network of private firms behind a space revolution.

】

item.title: 泽连斯基称白宫团队将访问基辅讨论计划
item.description: 乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）说，美国白宫团队不久将访问乌克兰，就他的所谓 "胜利计划 "提供反馈意见，该计划概述了他结束俄罗斯入侵的愿景。【原文：Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy says the US White House team will soon visit Ukraine to provide feedback on his so-called “victory plan” that outlines his vision for ending Russia’s invasion.】

item.title: 美国银行预计 2025 年小额贷款销售额将达到创纪录的 5200 亿美元
item.description: 市政债券市场最大承销商的策略师们预测，国家和地方政府债务银行家们今年将非常忙碌。【原文：Strategists at the municipal-bond market’s biggest underwriter are forecasting a very busy year for state and local government debt bankers.】

item.title: 危机四伏的玻利维亚突然成为令人惊喜的债券投资机会
item.description: 玻利维亚的美元债券飙升至一年来的最高点，原因是 KNG Securities 对该债券持积极态度，而且前总统埃沃-莫拉莱斯面临法律挑战，这降低了他在这个危机四伏的国家重新掌权的可能性。【原文：Bolivia’s dollar bonds have soared to the highest in a year as KNG Securities turned positive on the notes and former president Evo Morales faced legal challenges, reducing his chances of returning to power in the crisis-ridden nation.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司不会急于实施浮动风力发电项目，即使法国也在推进该项目
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）首席执行官帕特里克-普瓦纳（Patrick Pouyanne）表示，该能源巨头并不急于开发大型、昂贵的浮动风力发电场，而法国政府刚刚公布了推进这一新兴技术的计划，以帮助实现其净零排放目标。【原文：TotalEnergies SE Chief Executive Officer Patrick Pouyanne said the energy giant is in no rush to develop large, expensive floating wind farms, just as the French government unveiled plans to press ahead with the nascent technology to help reach its net zero ambitions.】

item.title: 千禧年 100 亿美元融资吸引 200 亿美元资金
item.description: 伊兹-英格兰德（Izzy Englander）的千禧年管理公司（Millennium Management）旨在为其对冲基金筹集多达 100 亿美元的新资金。事实证明，投资者想要的资金是这个数额的两倍。【原文：Izzy Englander’s Millennium Management aimed to raise as much as $10 billion of new capital for its hedge fund. It turns out investors wanted to fork over twice that amount.】

item.title: 哈里斯的居家护理计划被视为 Addus 等股票的提振因素
item.description: 紧接着美国副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）概述了她的计划，即如果她成为总统，将覆盖居家养老护理，华尔街分析师预测，与该业务相关的公司将从她的提议中受益。【原文：Hot on the heels of US Vice President Kamala Harris outlining her plan to cover in-home senior care if she becomes president, Wall Street analysts are predicting that companies involved with the business will benefit from her proposal.】

item.title: 高风险 ETF 团队以多空赌注抢占华尔街风头
item.description: 想做多比特币持有者微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc.想买入流媒体巨头 Netflix Inc.或者将谷歌母公司 Alphabet Inc. 与纽约时报公司对立起来？【原文：Want to go long Bitcoin-holder MicroStrategy Inc. while shorting megabank JPMorgan Chase & Co.? How about buying streaming giant Netflix Inc. while dumping Comcast Corp.? Or pitting Google-parent Alphabet Inc. against New York Times Co.?】

item.title: 加纳执政党失去多数席位后将抵制议会
item.description: 加纳执政党新爱国党（New Patriotic Party）宣布抵制议会，因为该党在议会中的两个席位被宣布空缺，这使该党在大选前仅七周就沦为少数派。【原文：Ghana’s ruling New Patriotic Party announced a boycott of parliament after two of its seats in the chamber were declared vacant, pushing it into the minority just seven weeks ahead of a general election.】

item.title: 又有十亿人将使用互联网
item.description:
在本期《与汉娜-弗莱共话未来》节目中，我们将探讨发展中国家的技术革命及其对全球的影响。【原文：

On this episode of The Future with Hannah Fry, we explore a technological revolution in the developing world and its global ramifications.

】

item.title: 象牙海岸根据新的豆荚数量上调 2024-25 年可可产量预测
item.description: 在上个月重新清点豆荚之后，象牙海岸将 2024-2025 年的可可收成预测提高了 10%之多。【原文：Ivory Coast has raised its cocoa harvest forecast for 2024-2025 by as much as 10% following a fresh counting of pods last month.】

item.title: 美国 "僵尸之夏 "削弱能源需求和天然气价格
item.description: 美国将在 10 月余下的几周内迎来异常温暖的天气，这已经影响了天然气的价格和需求。【原文：The US is headed for weeks of abnormally warm weather through the rest of October, and it’s already shaken prices and demand for natural gas.】

item.title: 兰姆-威斯顿在《华尔街日报》报道中跳槽，激进分子 Jana 力促出售
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，激进投资者 Jana Partners 正在推动这家炸薯条供应商探索出售事宜，兰姆威斯顿控股公司的股票在周五早盘交易中跳涨。【原文：Shares of Lamb Weston Holdings Inc. jumped in early trading on Friday after the Wall Street Journal reported that activist investor Jana Partners is pushing the french-fry supplier to explore a sale.】

item.title: 国药控股收购中国中药公司未获监管部门批准
item.description: 由于未能获得中国监管机构的必要批准，中国医药集团总公司（China National Pharmaceutical Group Co.【原文：China National Pharmaceutical Group Co.’s latest attempt to take China Traditional Chinese Medicine Holdings Co. private has fallen through as it was unable to secure necessary regulatory approval from Chinese regulators.】

item.title: 斯凯登因业务下滑关闭上海办公室
item.description: Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher & Flom LLP 将关闭其上海办事处，并在中国大陆裁员，原因是中国经济衰退导致交易放缓，影响了该律师事务所的业务。【原文：Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher & Flom LLP is shuttering its Shanghai office and laid off some staff in the mainland after the law firm’s business was dented by a slowdown in deals amid China’s economic slump.】

item.title: 据说 Cerberus 和 Intrum 接近达成购买 20 亿欧元 Hoist 贷款的协议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Cerberus Capital Management LP 和 Intrum AB 即将达成一项协议，从 Hoist Finance AB 收购面值约 20 亿欧元（22 亿美元）的西班牙不良贷款。【原文：Cerberus Capital Management LP and Intrum AB are nearing a deal to buy Spanish bad loans with a face value of around €2 billion ($2.2 billion) from Hoist Finance AB, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 西班业公司的澳大利亚锌矿运营因丛林大火而停止
item.description: Sibanye Stillwater Ltd. 预计，在一场丛林大火损坏了部分设备后，其位于澳大利亚的 Century 锌矿项目将暂停运营至 11 月中旬。【原文：Sibanye Stillwater Ltd. expects operations at its Century zinc project in Australia to be suspended until mid-November after a bushfire damaged some equipment.】

item.title: Verizon 将从 US Cellular 购买 10 亿美元频谱资产
item.description: 美国最大的无线运营商威瑞森通信公司（Verizon Communications Inc.【原文：Verizon Communications Inc., the biggest wireless carrier in the US, will buy some of US Cellular Corp.’s spectrum licenses for $1 billion as the tower operator sheds parts of its portfolio.】

item.title: 潘帕公司评估阿根廷液化天然气项目，米莱公司助力页岩增长
item.description: 阿根廷能源生产商潘帕能源公司（Pampa Energia SA）将在未来三个月内决定是否合作建设一座价值数十亿美元的液化天然气工厂，因为哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）总统放松经济管制的努力加速了世界第二大页岩气矿床的开发。【原文：Argentina energy producer Pampa Energia SA will decide in the next three months whether to partner on a multibillion-dollar LNG plant as President Javier Milei’s crusade to deregulate the economy accelerates development of the world’s second-biggest shale gas deposit.】

item.title: 随着风暴 "阿什利 "的逼近，英国风力发电量有望创下历史新高
item.description: 由于风暴 "阿什利 "从大西洋席卷而来，英国风力发电量将在本周末创下新纪录。【原文：UK wind power output is set to hit a fresh record this weekend as Storm Ashley is sweeping in from the Atlantic Ocean.】

item.title: 马来西亚 2025 年支出计划的赢家和输家
item.description: 马来西亚零售商和旅游相关企业将从明年的国家支出计划中获益，因为政府将增加现金派发和奖励措施，以减轻取消部分补贴所带来的影响。【原文：Malaysia’s retailers and tourism-related firms are poised to benefit from the national spending plan for next year as the government increases cash handouts and incentives to mitigate the impact of some subsidy removals.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Farrer 募集 5 亿美元用于农业贸易
item.description: 大宗商品对冲基金 Farrer Capital Management Pty 在筹集了 5 亿美元资金后，已停止接受新的投资，成为市场上仅有的专业农业投资者之一。【原文：Commodity hedge fund Farrer Capital Management Pty has closed to new investment after raising $500 million, making it one of the only specialist agriculture investors in the market.】

item.title: 扎布卡股票在华沙交易第二天跌破首次公开募股价格
item.description: 波兰连锁便利店 Zabka Group SA 的股价在上市交易的第二天就跌破了首次公开募股的价格，这对欧洲今年第四大上市企业造成了打击。【原文：Polish convenience store chain Zabka Group SA saw its shares slump below their initial public offering price on their second day of trading, in a blow to Europe’s fourth-biggest listing this year.】

item.title: 欧洲退缩，全球健康资助者转向海湾国家
item.description: 阿拉伯海湾国家越来越多地被要求提供医疗保健资金，因为人们越来越担心传统的欧洲捐助者是否有能力继续满足捐款需求。【原文：Arab Gulf states are increasingly being asked for health-care funding as concern grows over the ability of traditional European donors to continue meeting contribution needs.】

item.title: 新兴市场货币因中国支持而走强
item.description: 周五，新兴市场货币受到中国央行支持市场举措的提振而走高，而此前的数据显示中国经济扩张速度为六个季度以来最低。【原文：Emerging-market currencies advanced Friday, buoyed by a move by China’s central bank to support markets, just as data showed the economy expanding the least in six quarters.】

item.title: 人工智能驱动的能源热潮的现实检验
item.description:
国际能源署表示，计算中心将导致电力需求飙升并非必然。【原文：

It’s not a given that computing centers will cause electricity needs to soar, the IEA says.

】

item.title: SLB 警告谨慎的石油勘探者已放缓支出增长速度
item.description: 全球最大的油田服务供应商 SLB 公司警告说，在过去几个月里，由于大宗商品价格下跌，客户采取谨慎态度，石油勘探公司的支出增长有所减弱。【原文：SLB, the world’s biggest oilfield services provider, warned that spending growth by oil explorers has waned in the past few months as customers take a cautious approach amid lower commodity prices.】

item.title: 电动汽车需求降温，CATL 季度收入大幅减少
item.description: 当代 Amperex Technology Co.由于全球电动汽车销售开始放缓，该公司公布的季度净利润远低于分析师的预期。【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. reported quarterly net income well short of analyst estimates as the global slowdown in electric vehicle sales starts to bite.】
